attributes.additional_details: Breakout rooms are responsible for 78% of student's anxiety during this online school period. Many of my peers complain about the stress caused over this foolish feature and i say ENOUGH!! I say no more sitting in your lesson scared your teacher is going to make you talk to your peers about the work no one is actually going to do. I say change online education for the better.
attributes.background: Stop breakout rooms on our school online lessons!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual schools.
